question:
The municipal corporation in the area where you live has decided to demolish a historical building to build a shopping center. Write a letter to the mayor of the corporation. In your letter:

You have to explain 
why it is important to preserve the building 
suggest how the building can be used to benefit the local community.
text: I am writing this letter in regards to express my concerns on the decision taken to demolish the  the palace and to make shopping center in its place.

The building which you have planned to bring down is one of the renowed architechtually and vintage standing in our area, it has been muse of attraction for many years and most of our childhood is spent inside the building exploring it. Preserving this structure is really important as we have many tourist visiting this place year on year.

I would suggest you to reinnovate this building rather than destroying it, as we already have too many shopping areas in the city however we have only one building which represents our ancient people and culture. If we re-design it there many people would revisit this place and would place the word of mouth across the globe about this beautiful structure.
Your swift co-operation is greatly appreciated.
